body.content:
Dear Sir/Ma , We are Financial/Stock  Consultant with the power to source 
for Finance on behalf of Individuals , Corporate Bodies , 
Government Establishment Etc, clients seeking for Financial 
assistance to either execute project/Establishment .    we offer 100% LTV Non-recourse loan with our BG Leased 
Monetization Program, where 80% goes to the borrower and 
the remaining 20% is used to cover the Monetization, 
Leasing and Broker fees. The most interesting part of this 
program is that this is a Non-Recourse Loan generated from 
our Monetization Program and is Non-Refundable, also the 
Monetization, Leasing and Broker fees will be deducted from 
the remaining 20% at closing but you will only be 
responsible for the Bank Swift Charges to send the Bank 
Guarantee(Collateral) to the lender bank ,  we will issue 
to you signed and sealed Corporate Payment Guarantee (CPG) 
which will be endorsed by the issuing bank ,  this will 
guarantee your money for the swift charges is 100% safe and 
secure, if we by anyway fail to provide you with the 80% 
Non-recourse (Non Refundable Loan) within 5-7 working days 
,  we will immediately return back your funds and will be 
liable for 2% penalty fee for default.    The level of transparency, access, protection, and 
proof provided in this program is unique and is rarely 
offered in the Bank Guarantee Funding or  Money Guarantee 
industry. The entire End to End Proven Program includes 
BOTH Issuing a Bank Guarantee and Funding that Bank 
Guarantee. Everything has been pre-structured, pre-approved 
and pre-negotiated so it is hassle and headache free with 
certain pre-determined outcomes.   Total contract protection with the Bank Guarantee Issuer 
and Bank Guarantee Funder agreeing to penalties thereby 
making this transaction 100% risk-free.    Our Loan /BG ranges between $50 million USD/EUR  and 
maximum of $400 million USD/EUR  .We look forward to hear from you. Best Regards,
MR larry Lawrence Email :lawrencelarry426@gmail.com
